    Methods in de.aicard.domains.Social with parameters of type Account 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Chat.addParticipant​(Account _newParticipant)
    -participants can be added to the chat with the function addParticipant -the function getChatCreator is used to get the chat creator which is the first in the participants list -the Chat history can be cleared with the function clearHistory -messages can be sent , for that we need the account and the message to create the object Message and then add it to the chat history -messages can be removed from the chat history, with the help of an index argument or the actual Message object argument
    void Message.clickLike​(Account _account)
    the function clickLike checks if a person is in the list of those who liked the message if the person liked the message, his name is removed from the list (dislike) if the person didn't like the message,his name is added to the list (like)
    void Chat.sendMessage​(java.lang.String _newComment, Account _newSender)
